## üß≠ Our Pledge

We pledge to make participation in this project a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of:

## ü§ù Our Standards

Examples of behavior that contributes to a positive environment include:

- Being respectful and empathetic
- Giving and gracefully accepting constructive feedback
- Focusing on what‚Äôs best for the community
- Showing appreciation for others‚Äô contributions

Examples of unacceptable behavior include:

- Trolling, insulting or derogatory comments
- Personal or political attacks
- Public or private harassment
- Publishing others‚Äô private information without consent
- Any conduct that would be inappropriate in a professional setting

## üö® Enforcement

Project maintainers are responsible for clarifying and enforcing this Code of Conduct.  
In cases of unacceptable behavior, maintainers may take appropriate action, including warnings, temporary bans, or permanent removal from participation.

To report violations, please open a private discussion or email the maintainers via your GitHub profile contact link.
